# PED::SET_PED_MAX_HEALTH

## Summary
Sets the peds max health

## Parameters
* **PED_INDEX** ped
* **INT** maxHealth

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Sets the maximum health of a ped.
